## Data Cleaning
```{r}
champ <- championsdata %>% 
  mutate(Team=str_replace_all(Team,"'", "")) %>% 
  mutate(Team=str_replace(Team,"Warriorrs","Warriors"))

champ
  
```

# Data Exploration

```{r}
glimpse(champ)

# Year: The year the series was played
# Team: The name of the team.
# Win: 1 = Win. 0 = Loss
# Home: 1 = Home team. 0 = Away team.
# Game: Game #
# MP - Total minutes played. 
# FG - Field goals made
# FGA - Field goal attempts
# FGP - Field Goal Percentage
# TP - 3 Point Field Goals Made
# TPA - Three point attempts
# TPP - three point percentage
# FT - Free throws made
# FTA - Free throws attempted
# FTP - Free throw percentage
# ORB - Offensive rebounds
# DRB - Defensive rebounds
# TRB - Total rebounds
# AST - Assists
# STL - Steals
# BLK - Blocks
# TOV - Turnovers
# PF - Personal fouls
# PTS - points scored

```

## Every Team in the Dataset 
```{r, fig.align='center'}
champ %>%
  distinct(Team)
```


## How Long were the Finals Series? 

```{r, fig.align='center'}
champ %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  count(Year) %>% arrange(Year) %>% 
  filter(n == 7)

champ %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  count(Year) %>% arrange(Year) %>% 
  filter(n == 6)

champ %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  count(Year) %>% arrange(Year) %>% 
  filter(n == 5)

champ %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  count(Year) %>% arrange(Year) %>% 
  filter(n == 4)

champ %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  count(Year) %>% arrange(Year) %>% 
  filter(n == 4 | n == 5 | n == 6 | n == 7) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n)) + geom_bar() + 
  xlab("Games in a Series") + ylab("Count of Teams") + 
  labs(title="Distribution of Games in a Series by Team from 1980-2018") + matt_theme
```


## Summarized Averages of Each Statistic
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
champ

champ_average1 <- champ %>%
  group_by(Year, Team) %>%
  summarise(.,
    average_points = mean(PTS),
    average_FGM = mean(FG),
    average_FGA = mean(FGA),
    average_FGP = mean(FGP),
    average_3 = mean(TP),
    average_3A = mean(TPA),
    average_3Pct = mean(TPP),
    average_FT = mean(FT),
    average_FTA = mean(FTA),
    average_ORB = mean(ORB),
    average_DRB = mean(DRB),
    average_TRB = mean(TRB),
    average_AST = mean(AST),
    average_STL = mean(STL),
    average_BLK = mean(BLK),
    average_TOV = mean(TOV),
    average_PF = mean(PF)) %>% 
  mutate(Champ = 1)


champ_average1


# Highest Average Points per Series
head(champ_average1 %>% select(Team, average_points) %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_points)))


# Highest Average Field Goal Percentage per Series Compared to Attempts and Makes
head(champ_average1 %>% select(Team, average_FGP, average_FGA, average_FGM) %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_FGP)))


# Highest Average Rebound per Series: Offensive and Defensive 
head(champ_average1 %>% select(Team, average_TRB, average_ORB, average_DRB) %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_TRB)))


# Most Blocks per Series
head(champ_average1 %>% select(Team, average_BLK) %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_BLK)))


# 3-Pointer Percentage, Attempts and Makes
head(champ_average1 %>% select(Team, average_3Pct, average_3A, average_3) %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_3Pct)))


# Most Assists per Series
head(champ_average1 %>% select(Team, average_AST) %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_AST)))
```


## Most Championships Per Team

```{r, fig.align = 'center'}
champ_average1 %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = reorder(Team, count), 
                count, 
                fill = Team)) + 
  geom_col() + 
  labs(title="<span style='color:#660099;'>**Lakers**</span>, 
    <span style='color:#CC0000;'>**Bulls**</span>, and
```

### The most NBA Finals Championships from this time span is the Los Angeles Lakers at 10, then the Chicago Bulls at 6, followed by the San Antonio Spurs at 5 and Boston Celtics at 4.

## Top 4 Franchises: How do they compare in points?
```{r, fig.align='center'}
champ_average1 %>% filter(Team == "Lakers" | Team == "Spurs" | Team == "Bulls" | Team == "Celtics") %>% 
  select(Year, Team, average_points) %>%
  arrange(desc(average_points)) 
```


## Championship Team's Average Points in each Year 

```{r, fig.align='center'}

champ_average1 %>%
    filter(Year < 2000 | Year >= 2000) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = Team, color = Team, size = average_points)) + geom_jitter(stat="identity", show.legend = TRUE, alpha = .6) + 
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#CC0000", "coral4", "darkgreen", "firebrick4", 
                             "#660099", "deepskyblue3", "lightskyblue", "firebrick", "dodgerblue4", "gray44", "blue")) + theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="black", size=10, 
                                      face="bold")) + labs(title="Championship Team's Average Points in each Year", size = "Average Points")



```



## Top 4 Teams: Average Points and Field Goal Attempts

```{r, fig.align='center'}
champ_average1 %>%
```


## Three's have Gone up, has that impacted other stats? Turnovers?

```{r, fig.align='center'}

 ggplot(aes(Year, value, color = AttemptVTO)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + labs(x = "Year", y = "", color = "Average 3FG Attempt") + scale_color_manual(labels = c("3's Attempted", "Turnovers"), values=c("#CC0000", "darkgreen")) + geom_smooth(method = "lm", size = .3, ymax = FALSE, ymin = FALSE)
```

# Correlation Matrices
```{r, warning=FALSE}
champ %>% select(Win, Home, FG, FGA, FGP, TP, TPA, TPP, FT, FTA, FTP, ORB, DRB, TRB, AST, STL, BLK, TOV, PF, PTS) %>% drop_na() %>% cor(., method = c("pearson")) %>% list() %>% map_df(tidy)


```

## Correlation of between Win and all variables
```{r}
correlation <- champ  %>% select(Win, Home, FG, FGA, FTP, FGP, TP, TPA, TPP, FT, FTA, ORB, DRB, TRB, AST, STL, BLK, TOV, PF, PTS) %>% drop_na() 

head(cor(correlation, method = c("pearson")) %>% list() %>% map_df(tidy), 1)

```

## Comparing Correlation Matrices from Pre 1999 and Post 1999

```{r, warning= FALSE}
corBefore2000 <- champ %>%  filter(Year < 1999) %>% select(Win, Home, FG, FGA, FGP, TP, TPA, TPP, FT, FTA, ORB, FTP, DRB, TRB, AST, STL, BLK, TOV, PF, PTS) %>% drop_na() 

corAfter2000 <- champ %>%  filter(Year >= 1999) %>% select(Win, Home, FG, FGA, FGP, TP, TPA, TPP, FT, FTA,FTP, ORB, DRB, TRB, AST, STL, BLK, TOV, PF, PTS) %>% drop_na() 


(head(cor(corBefore2000, method = c("pearson")) %>% list() %>% map_df(tidy), 1))
(head(cor(corAfter2000, method = c("pearson")) %>% list() %>% map_df(tidy), 1))


```


# Modeling

```{r}
champ1 <- correlation 

# Base model with all Variables
basemodel <- lm(Win ~ Home + FG + FGA + FGP + TP + TPA + TPP + FT + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TRB + AST + STL + BLK + TOV + PF + PTS, data = champ1)

# Base Estimates
basemodel %>% get_regression_table()

# Stepwise function
step(basemodel)

# Regression Summaries
get_regression_summaries(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TP + TPA + FT + FTA + ORB + DRB + 
    STL + TOV, data = champ1))
get_regression_table(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TP + TPA + FT + FTA + ORB + DRB + 
    STL + TOV, data = champ1))

```
### Base Model:
+ R2 of .561
+ MSE = 0.0911
+ Highest predictor was Field goal's made and Offensive rebounds



## Comparing the "Base Model" to see if it fits better Pre-2000 or Post-2000

```{r}
# Fitting Base Model to Pre-2000

basemodel_pre2000 <- lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TP + TPA + FT + FTA + ORB + DRB + STL + TOV, data = corBefore2000)

# Regression Summaries & Table
get_regression_summaries(basemodel_pre2000)
get_regression_table(basemodel_pre2000)

# Fitting base model to Post-2000

basemodel_pst2000 <- lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TP + TPA + FT + FTA + ORB + DRB + STL + TOV, data = corAfter2000)


# Regression Summaries & Table
get_regression_summaries(basemodel_pst2000)
get_regression_table(basemodel_pst2000)
```
### Pre 2000: 
+ R2 of .579
+ MSE = .0803
+ Three pointer's made was highest predictor

### Post 2000:
+ R2 of .579
+ 0.0848
+ Free Throw makes were highest predictor



## Model Pre 2000

```{r}
model2 <- lm(Win ~ Home + FG + FGA + FGP + TP + TPA + TPP + FT + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TRB + AST + STL + BLK + TOV + PF + PTS, data = corBefore2000)

# Regression Table & Summaries
model2 %>% get_regression_table()
model2 %>% get_regression_summaries()

# Stepwise function
step(model2)

# Regression Summaries and Table of Pre 2000 model
get_regression_summaries(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + TP + TPA + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + 
    STL + TOV, data = corBefore2000))
get_regression_table(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + TP + TPA + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + 
    STL + TOV, data = corBefore2000))

```
### Pre 2000 Model
+ Low R2
+ Three pointers percentage was highest predictor
+ MSE = 0.1368


## Model post 2000

```{r}
model3 <- lm(Win ~ Home + FG + FGA + FGP + TP + TPA + TPP + FT + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TRB + AST + STL + BLK + TOV + PF + PTS, data = corAfter2000)

# Regression Table & Summaries
model3 %>% get_regression_table()
model3 %>% get_regression_summaries()

# Stepwise function
step(model3)

# Regression Summaries of Post 2000 model
get_regression_summaries(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TP + TPA + FTA + FTP + DRB + AST + 
    STL + BLK + TOV, data = corAfter2000))
get_regression_table(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TP + TPA + FTA + FTP + DRB + AST + 
    STL + BLK + TOV, data = corAfter2000))
```
### Model Post 2000:
+ R2 of .612
+ MSE = 0.078
+ Highest predictor was Free Throw percentage



# Regression Through the Decades

## Regression of the 80's

```{r}
reg80s <- champ %>% filter(Year >= 1980 & Year <= 1989) %>% select(Win, Home, FG, FGA, FGP, TP, TPA, TPP, FT, FTA,FTP, ORB, DRB, TRB, AST, STL, BLK, TOV, PF, PTS) %>% drop_na()

# Using all Variables
model80s <- lm(Win ~ Home + FG + FGA + FGP + TP + TPA + TPP + FT + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TRB + AST + STL + BLK + TOV + PF + PTS, data = reg80s)


# Regression Table & Summaries
model80s %>% get_regression_table()
model80s %>% get_regression_summaries()

# Stepwise function 
step(model80s)

# Regression Summaries & Table of 90s Model
get_regression_summaries(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGP + TPA + FT + ORB + DRB + TOV, data = reg80s))
get_regression_table(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGP + TPA + FT + ORB + DRB + TOV, data = reg80s))

```
### Regression of the 80's after stepwise:
+ R2 of .73
+ MSE = 0.059
+ Highest Predictor is Field goal percentage


## Regression of the 90's

```{r}
reg90s <- champ %>% filter(Year >= 1990 & Year <= 1999) %>% select(Win, Home, FG, FGA, FGP, TP, TPA, TPP, FT, FTA,FTP, ORB, DRB, TRB, AST, STL, BLK, TOV, PF, PTS) %>% drop_na()


model90s <- lm(Win ~ Home + FG + FGA + FGP + TP + TPA + TPP + FT + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TRB + AST + STL + BLK + TOV + PF + PTS, data = reg90s)

# Regression Table & Summaries
model90s %>% get_regression_table()
model90s %>% get_regression_summaries()

# Stepwise function
step(model90s)

# Regression Summaries & Table of 90s Model
get_regression_summaries(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGP + TPP + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TOV + PF, data = reg90s))
get_regression_table(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGP + TPP + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TOV + PF, data = reg90s))

```
### Regression of the 90's after stepwise:
+ R2 of .64
+ MSE = 0.07287
+ Highest Predictor again is Field goal percentage, Three pointer percentage  & Free Throw percentage



## Regression of the 2000's

```{r}
reg00s <- champ %>% filter(Year >= 2000 & Year <= 2009) %>% select(Win, Home, FG, FGA, FGP, TP, TPA, TPP, FT, FTA,FTP, ORB, DRB, TRB, AST, STL, BLK, TOV, PF, PTS) %>% drop_na()


model00s <- lm(Win ~ Home + FG + FGA + FGP + TP + TPA + TPP + FT + FTA + FTP + ORB + DRB + TRB + AST + STL + BLK + TOV + PF + PTS, data = reg00s)

# Regression Table & Summaries
model00s %>% get_regression_table()
model00s %>% get_regression_summaries()

# Stepwise function
step(model00s)

# Regression Summaries & Table of 00s Model
get_regression_summaries(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TPA + FTP + DRB + TOV, data = reg00s))
get_regression_table(lm(formula = Win ~ FG + FGA + TPA + FTP + DRB + TOV, data = reg00s))

```
### Regression of the 2000's after stepwise:
+ R2 of .65
+ MSE = 0.0672
+ Highest Predictor again is Free Throw percentage

# Takeaways
+ Not a surprise, Field goal percentage was often the highest predictor
+ Noticed increase in Three pointer statistics (TP,TPA,TPP)
+ High Field goal attempts doesn't mean high points
+ More cleaning
